snippet: Contractors are in Ortley Beach, N.J., not to rebuild houses, but to preserve, decontaminate, stabilize or demolish existing ones so the rebuilding can start later.
abstract: Six weeks after Hurricane Sandy sent cascades of seawater roaring through local streets of Ortley, NJ, restoration has come in small steps; contractors are there not to rebuild houses, but to preserve, decontaminate, stabilize or demolish existing ones so the rebuilding can start later (Series: Coming Back).
lead_paragraph: Contractors are in Ortley Beach, N.J., not to rebuild houses, but to preserve, decontaminate, stabilize or demolish existing ones so the rebuilding can start later.

headline.print_headline: In Shore Community, Small Steps Toward Renewal
headline.seo: Ortley Beach, N.J., Still Vacated, Recovers Slowly
headline.main: In Shore Community, Small Steps Toward Renewal
